about_the_game:
A new twist on anagrams, Anagraphs is a free puzzle designed to challenge your linguistic and spatial skills.

Anagraphs extends the concept of anagrams by including letters that can be rotated to make other characters. In a typical anagram the letters can be re-arranged to form new words ("ma" and "am" for example) but in Anagraphs, the "m" character can be rotated to form a 'w' which allows for the word "aw" to be included.

Built with a specially designed font with several characters that can be rotated in such a way, Anagraphs is a challenging linguistic puzzle where you must optimize paths to earn stars used to unlock new levels. Anagraphs is a spiritual successor to the popular word game, Synonymy.

Anagraphs is free, with open source on GitHub. It was developed by Cinq-Mars Media, an educational non-profit with projects and games featured at E3, PAX and festivals worldwide.

Anagraphs extends the concept of anagrams by including letters that can be rotated to make other characters. In a typical anagram the letters can be re-arranged to form new words ("ma" and "am" for example) but in Anagraphs, the "m" character can be rotated to form a 'w' which allows for the word "aw" to be included.

Built with a specially designed font with several characters that can be rotated in such a way, Anagraphs is a challenging linguistic puzzle where you must optimize paths to earn stars used to unlock new levels. Anagraphs is a spiritual successor to the popular word game, Synonymy.

Anagraphs is free, with open source on GitHub. It was developed by Cinq-Mars Media, an educational non-profit with projects and games featured at E3, PAX and festivals worldwide.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+, Debian 8+, openSUSE 13.3+, or Fedora Linux 24+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+, Debian 8+, openSUSE 13.3+, or Fedora Linux 24+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X High Sierra or Later
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or better / Silicon
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan 10.11 or later
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or better / Silicon
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Anagraphs: An Anagram Game With a Twist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM

reviews:
“An ingenious and unique word game”
Droid Gamers
short_description: Anagrams with a twist! From the creator of the popular word game Synonymy, an addicting new word game where the anagram possibilities are greater than ever before.
